title: How many people want to be or are full-time writers? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh, what I'd do to be a full-time writer! I'd say, most writers who are passionate about their work want to be full-time writers. But passion doesn't pay bills, and from what I've seen, most people don't consider writing to be anything more than a hobby. It's a shame, really. This world is full of so many creative minds that don't get the attention they deserve…
